entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Fort Albany
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:14 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Moosonee Airport 11:52 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.2°C
Pressure: 96.7 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -2.3°C
Wind: N 18 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Blizzard developing this afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Blizzard. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 20. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
